org.TheGivingChild.Screens

Class ScreenHowToPlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
      • org.TheGivingChild.Screens.ScreenHowToPlay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    class ScreenHowToPlay
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
    This class creates the how to play screen. It displays a message that explains how the game will be played. It also allows navigation to any other screen as well.
    Author:
    ctokunag
